alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 4:24PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Baker and northeastern Malheur Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 424 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vale, or 15 miles west of Ontario, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jamieson around 530 PM MDT. Moores Hollow around 540 PM MDT. Farewell Bend State Park around 450 PM PDT. Brosman Mountain and Annex around 550 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
